attributes.action: recommend to Her Majesty that Andrew ‘Freddie’ Flintoff MBE be knighted for his services to cricket.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The archetypal English hero whose explosive hitting and fearsome bowling have entertained crowds the world over.  It can never be said that Fred gives less than his best even when playing with considerable pain.  That he has shown that he is human liking the occasional beer and pedalo outing makes him all the more real to his supporters.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
